p: For this synthetic data set, we plot in Fig 11 the predicted final epidemic size as a function of the different SPV characteristics. In Tables 9 and 10, correlation coefficients for single and paired SPV characteristics, and summary statistics FI âˆž and R 0, are provided for the epidemic pairs in this synthetic data set. A direct inspection of results in Fig 11 and Tables 9 and 10 lead to the following conclusions:
